effects.title: Bounce Text
effects.css: @keyframes bounce { 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(-20px); } } .bounce { animation: bounce 1s infinite; }

effects.title: Pulse Button
effects.css: @keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); } 50% { transform: scale(1.1); } } .pulse { animation: pulse 1s infinite; }

effects.title: Fade In Box
effects.css: .fade-in-box { opacity: 0; animation: fadeIn 2s forwards; } @keyframes fadeIn { to { opacity: 1; } }
